subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Jürgen Melzer of Austria will play Juan Martín del Potro of Argentina on Sunday in the final of the Austrian Open in Kitzbühel. Melzer beat last year’s runner-up, Potito Starace of Italy, 6-4, 6-7 (8), 6-3, on Saturday to reach his first final of the year; Del Potro defeated Victor Hanescu of Romania, 6-3, 7-6 (5).
